description:
network manager specific flags in vmwareapi readme need to be updated.

Some changes to nova code necessitate modifications from olympus end. 
Both xenapi_net and vmwareapi_net are removed from nova source code. as The hypervisor api (xenapi or vmwareapi) specific network interface drivers are introduced and new flags specific to supported hypervisor xen and vmware are below,

"xenapi_vif_driver" for xenapi (default value nova.virt.xenapi.vif.XenAPIBridgeDriver) 
"vmware_vif_driver" for vmwareapi. (default value nova.virt.vmwareapi.vif.VMWareVlanBridgeDriver) 

vmwareapi driver uses vmwareapi_vlan_interface instead of vlan_interface.
title: network manager specific flags in vmwareapi readme need to be updated

comments.content:
network manager specific flags in vmwareapi readme need to be updated.

Some changes to nova code necessitate modifications from olympus end. 
Both xenapi_net and vmwareapi_net are removed from nova source code. as The hypervisor api (xenapi or vmwareapi) specific network interface drivers are introduced and new flags specific to supported hypervisor xen and vmware are below,

"xenapi_vif_driver" for xenapi (default value nova.virt.xenapi.vif.XenAPIBridgeDriver) 
"vmware_vif_driver" for vmwareapi. (default value nova.virt.vmwareapi.vif.VMWareVlanBridgeDriver) 

vmwareapi driver uses vmwareapi_vlan_interface instead of vlan_interface.
